info.description: 进销存系统后端 API - 基于 DDD 设计的库存管理系统
info.title: ERP Backend API

post.description: Authenticate user with username and password. Returns access token in response body and sets refresh token as httpOnly cookie.
Logout and invalidate the current session. Clears refresh token cookie.

get.description: Get the currently authenticated user's information

post.description: Get new access token using refresh token from httpOnly cookie. Falls back to request body for backward compatibility.

get.description: Retrieve a paginated list of categories

delete.description: Remove an item from a purchase return (only allowed in DRAFT status)

post.description: Reject a purchase return (transitions from PENDING to REJECTED)

Submit a purchase return for approval (transitions from DRAFT to PENDING)
